description.value:
A user that possesses this tome gains +10 to Common Lore (Koronus Expanse) and Evaluate Tests. It may also contain secrets relating to undiscovered treasures.

Requirements

A Tome cataloging many valuable items and the nature of rare commodities.

Effect: Scarce

Notes: -
